targets.query:
from(bucket: "nxos_gnmi")
  |> range(start: -10s)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mac_table_entries")
  |> drop(columns: ["_time", "_start", "_stop", "path", "subscription", "tag1", "host", "_measurement", "_value", "_field"])
  |> keyValues(keyColumns: ["mac_address"])
  |> group()
  |> count()
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "nxos_gnmi")
  |> range(start: -10s)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "l2rib_mac_entries")
  |> drop(columns: ["_time", "_start", "_stop", "path", "subscription", "tag1", "host", "_measurement", "_value", "_field", "name", "source", "producer"])
  |> keyValues(keyColumns: ["mac_address"])
  |> group()
  |> count()
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "nxos_gnmi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "vxlan_peers")
  |> drop(columns: ["_time", "_start", "_stop", "path", "subscription", "tag1", "host", "_measurement"])
  |> first()
  |> toString()
  |> group()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["peer_address"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["endpoint_peer/peer_address", "endpoint_peer/state/peer_address"])
  |> rename(columns: {"peer_address": "Peer Address"})
  |> rename(columns: {"endpoint_peer/state/peer_state": "Peer State"})
  |> rename(columns: {"endpoint_peer/state/uptime": "Uptime"})
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "nxos_gnmi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mac_table_entries")
  |> drop(columns: ["_time", "_start", "_stop", "path", "subscription", "tag1", "host", "_measurement"])
  |> first()
  |> toString()
  |> group()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["mac_address"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "nxos_gnmi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "l2rib_mac_entries")
  |> drop(columns: ["_time", "_start", "_stop", "path", "subscription", "tag1", "host", "_measurement"])
  |> first()
  |> toString()
  |> group()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["mac_address"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "nxos_gnmi")
  |> range(start: -356d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "native_system_hostname")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "name")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${source}")
  |> fill(column: "_value", usePrevious: true)

from(bucket: "nxos_gnmi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ping")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "result_code")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["url"] == "${source}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "nxos_gnmi")
  |> range(start: -356d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "native_system_version")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "nxosVersion")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${source}")
  |> fill(column: "_value", usePrevious: true)

from(bucket: "nxos_gnmi")
  |> range(start: -356d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "native_system_version")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "kernelUptime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${source}")
  |> last()
  |> fill(column: "_value", usePrevious: true)

from(bucket: "nxos_gnmi")
  |> range(start: -356d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "native_system_version")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "lastResetReason")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${source}")
  |> fill(column: "_value", usePrevious: true)

from(bucket: "nxos_gnmi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "native_cpu_load")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usageAvg")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["durationname"] == "last60seconds")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${source}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "nxos_gnmi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "native_mem_usage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "curr")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${source}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

descr = from(bucket: "nxos_gnmi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "native_alarm")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Alarm_list/description" )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${source}")
sev = from(bucket: "nxos_gnmi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "native_alarm")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Alarm_list/severity")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${source}")
join(tables: {descr, sev}, on: ["id"], method: "inner")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time_descr,
      _value: r._value_sev + " " + r._value_descr
    })
  )

from(bucket: "nxos_gnmi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "native_psu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pIn")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${source}")
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> sum(column: "_value")

data1 = from(bucket: "nxos_gnmi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "native_temperature_sensor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "tempValue" )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${source}")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","_value",  "device:/System/ch-items/supslot-items/SupCSlot-list/sup-items/sensor-items/Sensor-list/id"])
data2 = from(bucket: "nxos_gnmi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "native_temperature_sensor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "model")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${source}")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","_value", "device:/System/ch-items/supslot-items/SupCSlot-list/sup-items/sensor-items/Sensor-list/id"])
  |> group(columns: ["_value"])
join(
  tables: {d1: data1, d2: data2},
  on: ["_time", "device:/System/ch-items/supslot-items/SupCSlot-list/sup-items/sensor-items/Sensor-list/id"]
)

from(bucket: "nxos_gnmi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "native_l2_vlan")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "BD_list/accEncap")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${source}")
  |> group()
  |> unique(column: "_value")
  |> count(column: "_value")

from(bucket: "nxos_gnmi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "native_l3_vrf")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "encap")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${source}")
  |> group()
  |> unique(column: "_value")
  |> count(column: "_value")

up = from(bucket: "nxos_gnmi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "native_interface_operSt")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "operSt")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] == "up")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${source}")
  |> group()
  |> unique(column: "id")
  |> count(column: "id")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _field: "UP",  _value: r.id}))
down = from(bucket: "nxos_gnmi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "native_interface_operSt")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "operSt")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] == "down")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${source}")
  |> group()
  |> unique(column: "id")
  |> count(column: "id")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _field: "DOWN", _value: r.id}))
union(tables: [up, down])

from(bucket: "nxos_gnmi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "native_mac_address_table")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "macAddress")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${source}")
  |> unique(column: "macAddress")
  |> group(columns: ["vlan"], mode:"by")
  |> count(column: "_value")

from(bucket: "nxos_gnmi")
  |> range(start: -365d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "native_urib_route_count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "routeCount")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${source}")
  |> fill(column: "_value", usePrevious: true)

from(bucket: "nxos_gnmi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "native_l2_vlan")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "BD_list/id")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${source}")
  |> group()
  |> unique(column: "_value")
  |> count(column: "_value")

from(bucket: "nxos_gnmi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "native_l3_vrf")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "id")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${source}")
  |> group()
  |> unique(column: "_value")
  |> count(column: "_value")

from(bucket: "nxos_gnmi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "native_bgp_address_family")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "numPaths")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "l2vpn-evpn")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${source}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "nxos_gnmi")
  |> range(start: -365d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "native_bgp_configured_peers")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "numPeers")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${source}")
  |> fill(column: "_value", usePrevious: true)

from(bucket: "nxos_gnmi")
  |> range(start: -365d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "native_bgp_established_peers")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "numEstPeers")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${source}")
  |> fill(column: "_value", usePrevious: true)

from(bucket: "nxos_gnmi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "native_ingress_rate")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "octetRate")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${source}")
  |> group(columns: ["id"], mode:"by")

from(bucket: "nxos_gnmi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "native_egress_rate")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "octetRate")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${source}")
  |> group(columns: ["id"], mode:"by")
